data.title: Every Movie and Series Releasing on Netflix in 2024
data.meta_description: The full list of every Netflix Original movie and series added in 2024 so far and what's still to come.
data.text:
The full list of every Netflix Original movie and series added in 2024 so far and what's still to come.

Kasey Moore · @kasey__moore

What does the rest of 2024 have in store when it comes to new Netflix movies and series? Here’s your updated list of everything Netflix has confirmed for 2024, including all the new movies and series coming to Netflix from around the world. We’ve also kept in all the released titles from January through to August 2024!

Want to look even further ahead? We’re maintaining a list of everything we know that’s coming out in 2025 here.

Note: All dates are subject to change. Those marked with an asterisk are yet to be confirmed by Netflix. This post was first published in November 2023 and is being updated over time.

What’s Coming in January 2024

For more on what’s coming to Netflix in January 2024, check out our expanded Netflix Originals preview.

Bitconned – January 1st – Documentary on the criminal Ray Trapani.

Fool Me Once – January 1st – Limited series adapted from the Harlan Coben novel.

You Are What You Eat: A Twin Experiment – January 1st – Lifestyle/food documentary.

Delicious in Dungeon – January 3rd – Anime series

Society of the Snow – January 4th – Biopic on the flight disaster.

The Brothers Sun – January 4th – Michelle Yeoh stars in this action comedy about a Taipei gangster who returns home to protect his brother and mother.

Good Grief – January 5th – Dan Levy’s new comedy feature film for Netflix starring himself, Ruth Negga, Luke Evans, and Celia Imrie.

Gyeongseong Creature (Season 1 – Part 2) – January 5th – The final three episodes of the K-drama series.

Break Point (Season 2) – January 10th – Sports docuseries.

Boy Swallows Universe – January 11th – Limited series originating at of Australia set in the 1980s.

Detective Forst – January 11th – Polish drama series.

Killer Soup – January 11th – Indian drama comedy series.

Lift – January 11th – Kevin Hart leads this new heist-comedy from director F. Gary Gray.

Sonic Prime (Season 3) – January 11th – The final season of the animated kids series.

maboroshi – January 15th – Anime movie from MAPPA.

End of the Line – January 17th – Brazillian series.

From the Ashes – January 18th – Saudi Arabian drama.

Kübra – January 18th – Turkish drama movie.

Caged Wings – January 19th – Spanish drama film.

What’s Coming in February 2024

The Tourist (Season 1) – February 1st – Former HBO Max Original series heads to Netflix in two installments. Starring Jamie Dornan, the thriller is about a victim of a car crash who wakes up in hospital with amnesia.

Let’s Talk About CHU (Season 1) – February 2nd – Taiwanese romantic comedy series.

Orion and the Dark – February 2nd – From writer Charlie Kauffman, this new animated feature film is about a young boy who is afraid of almost everything but overcomes that with the help of fear itself.

Dee & Friends in Oz – February 5th – New animated kids series.
